data.text: “Job, do you think that what you said is right/correct?
and you say to God, ‘What good have I received for not sinning?
If you have sinned, that does not [RHQ] harm God at all.
And if you are righteous, does that help God?
It is other people who suffer because of the wicked things that you do,
“People cry out because of the many things that people do to others to ◄oppress them/treat them cruelly►;
But ◄no one/none of them► calls out to God,
He should be able to teach us more than all the wild animals do;
It is useless for them to cry out,
So, when you complain that you cannot see God,
Furthermore, you say that because he does not pay attention when people commit sins,
You say things that are useless;
